===Adjective===
{{zh-adj}}

# [[worried]]; [[anxious]]
#: {{zh-x|我 覺得{de} 很 '''著[着]{zháo}急'''，我 該 怎麼辦 啊？|I feel '''worried'''. What should I do?}}

===Verb===
{{zh-verb}}

# to [[worry]]; to feel [[anxious]]
#: {{zh-x|你 '''著[着]{zháo}''' 什麼 '''急''' 啊？|What are you '''worried about'''?}}

====Usage notes====
* As demonstrated in the example sentence above, the word {{zh-l|著急/着急}} can also be split up into a [[verb]] ({{zh-l|著/着|zháo}}) and an [[object]] ({{zh-l|急}}).
